name: Edit_2_CRUD
description: The benchmark set is testing the edition of 2 CRUD actions
text:
# Persona
{{persona}}

# Instructions
Your goal is to edit 2 metadata of inside the {{block/type}} called "{{block/name}}".
- First, {{metadata/verb}} the {{metadata/name}} with "{{metadata/value}}".
- Second, {{metadata/verb}} the {{metadata/name}} with "{{metadata/value}}".

# End result
The end result state of the app you would like to achieve:
[
  {
    "block_type":"{{block/type}}",
    "name": "{{block/name}}",
    "metadata to update": "{{metadata/name}}",
    "new value": "{{metadata/value}}",
  },
  {
    "block_type":"{{block/type}}",
    "name": "{{block/name}}",
    "metadata to update": "{{metadata/name}}",
    "new value": "{{metadata/value}}",
  }
]

name: Edit_1_CRUD
description: Edition of one simple CRUD metadata of a block.
text:
# Persona
{{persona}}

# Instructions
Your goal is to edit 1 metadata of inside the {{block/type}} called "{{block/name}}". On the block named "{{block/name}}", {{metadata/verb}} the {{metadata/name}} with the following value: "{{metadata/value}}".

# Secret end result
Below is the end result state of the app you would like to achieve:
[
  {
    "block_type":"{{block/type}}",
    "name": "{{block/name}}",
    "metadata to update": "{{metadata/name}}",
    "new value": "{{metadata/value}}",
  }
]
